data.title: Universiti Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia on LinkedIn: February 16, 2024: A collaboration meeting was held between UTHM and…
data.meta_description:
February 16, 2024: A collaboration meeting was held between UTHM and University of Anbar, Iraq at Royale Chulan, Kuala Lumpur. 

The meeting was co-chaired by…
data.text:
Introducing our UTHM Expert of the month, Professor Dr. Mohd Irwan bin Juki from the Faculty of Civil Engineering and Built Environment, Universiti Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia (UTHM). For brief news on Irwan, please click; https://lnkd.in/e4taPJmp For details CV, please click; https://lnkd.in/etGDsyMi Click https://lnkd.in/gzT9GePC for more info about UTHM #UTHMexperts #UTHMJohor #GTU2030 #UTHMproducesprofessionals #UTHMchampioningTVET

Introducing our UTHM Expert of the month, Professor Ts. Dr. Aida Mustapha from theFaculty of Applied Sciences and Technology, Universiti Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia (UTHM). For brief news on Aida, please click; https://lnkd.in/gcEa-Ywj For details CV, please click; https://lnkd.in/gbkViphu Click https://lnkd.in/gzT9GePC for more info about UTHM #UTHMexperts #UTHMJohor #GTU2030 #UTHMproducesprofessionals #UTHMchampioningTVET

Mobility Global Based Learning (gPBL) programme to Shibaura Institute of Technology (SIT), Japan was joined by 6 UTHM students recently. The programme was also co-joined by Japan, Vietnam, India and Taiwan along with 3 universities namely Huangzhong University of Science of Technology (HUST), Ming Chi University and Phenika University. This programme aims to promote collaboration networking and knowledge exchange among students and researchers from other countries. There were PBL activity and project based on IoT, cultural exchange, visits and discussion to promote and establish future networking such as student exchange, research collaboration and academic programmes sharing.

An international guest lecture webinar entitled “Human-Machine Interaction in Transportation System (Railway) was coordinated between UTHM and Sheffield Hallam University, United Kingdom, recently. Prof. Dr. Khalid Hasnan, former Head of Industry of Excellence for Railway , UTHM, Assoc. Prof. Dr. Raja Zuraidah Raja Mohd Rasi, Head of Centre of Research on Service and Operation Management (CRSOM), UTHM, and Dr. Mimi Faisyalini Ramli, Head of Department (International Mobility & Student Experience), International Office, UTHM were the guest speakers and were attended by the final year students of Rail Engineering, Sheffield Hallam University, UK.

#alumniexpertuthm 𝐌𝐮𝐡𝐚𝐦𝐚𝐝 𝐍𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐳𝐦𝐢 𝐀𝐛𝐚𝐬 CEO of Gading Group Berhad (GGB), a group of companies involved in providing services to the Aerospace, Marine, Defence, Energy, Technology, Waste Management, and related markets based out of Malaysia. Alumni year 2008 in Bachelor Of Engineering (Electrical) with Honours, University Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia, UTHM. Speciality and skills in Strategic Management, Telecommunication, Satellite Technology, Commercial Launch Program, G2G Trade Negotiations, and Space Policy. His flagship project currently is the development of Kuantan International Airport (KaIA) & Pahang Aerospace City (PAC) - and Space City Malaysia (SCM) project under the Malaysia Space Exploration 2030 (MSE2030) by the Malaysian Space Agency (MYSA). He is also serving as the Secretary General at Malaysian Space Industry Consortium (MASIC) under Malaysian Industry-Government Group for High Technology, Cyberjaya and Industrial Advisor for Space Industry at UniKL MIAT and UTHM. #UTHMJohor #GTU2030 #DenganHikmahKitaMeneroka
